GROUPCHATS.SORRY: Es wurden leider keine Gruppen gefunden.

VOICEMAILS.WAV_ERROR: WAV-Voicemails können nicht direkt abgespielt werden. Um diese anzuhören laden Sie die Voicemail bitte herunter.
VOICEMAILS.RIGHT_CLICK: Zum Speichern machen Sie bitte einen rechts-Klick auf den Download Button und anschließend wählen Sie aus dem Kontextmenü 'Speichern unter...'

SETTINGS.WEBRTC_HELP: WebRTC verwandelt Ihren Browser in ein Softphone.
SETTINGS.PA_OVERRIDE: Überschreibe vom Administrator gewählte Standard AutoAttendant Sprache.
SETTINGS.PA_OVERRIDE_HELP: Check this box to override the default AutoAttendant language chosen by the administrator.
SETTINGS.PA_LANGUAGE_HELP: The language used by the AutoAttendant if the override checkbox is selected.
SETTINGS.PA_OPERATOR_HELP: Extension or SIP URI the caller is transferred to after pressing 0.
SETTINGS.PA_PLAY_HELP: If enabled default prompt 'When you are finished press 1 for more options. To reach the operator, dial 0 at any time.' is played.
SETTINGS.PA_PA_DEPOSIT_HELP: If unchecked, callers will not be able to leave you voicemails, but they will be able to transfer to defined numbers. It is good practice to record a greeting explaining this.
SETTINGS.PA_FORWARD_HELP: If checked, the voicemails that are succesfully emailed will be deleted.
SETTINGS.SD_ONLY_GROUP_HELP: Enabling this option will delete all your existing Speed Dials and replace them with the Group Speed Dials
SETTINGS.SD_INVALID_END: You can not subscribe to presence with this speed dial value.
SETTINGS.US_PASSWORD_HELP: Used to log into the User Portal and XMPP. Minimum length is 8.
SETTINGS.US_BROWSER_EXIT_HELP: Web browser will issue a warning if you try to close the window or logout when logged in.
SETTINGS.US_VOICEMAIL_PIN_HELP: Used to log into voicemail. Numeric PINs are recommended, since only numbers can be dialed. Minimum length is 4.
SETTINGS.US_ANNOUNCEMENT_HELP: Voicemail prompt callers will hear before leaving a message.
SETTINGS.US_GREETING_HELP: No custom greeting, system greeting is used.
SETTINGS.US_GREETING_REPLACE: No initial greeting to replace with. Please upload greeting file.
SETTINGS.US_AUDIO_FILE_GREETING_HELP: Choose the file from your computer to upload and make it the new Greeting.
SETTINGS.US_ATTACH_AUDIO_HELP: If checked, the voicemail message will be attached to the notification email. Otherwise, the email will contain a link to retrieve voicemail message.
SETTINGS.US_PIN_HELP: Moderator access code for audio conference. Can be empty. If set, a participant PIN must also be set. Users logged in using this pin are automatically recognised as moderators.
SETTINGS.US_PARTICIPANT_PIN_HELP: Participant access code for audio conference. Can be empty.
SETTINGS.US_MAXMEMBERS_HELP: The maximum number of call legs to be allowed by this bridge. 0 means unlimited.
SETTINGS.US_QUICKSTART_HELP: A non-quickstart conference begins when the chair person arrives. Enable this if you want not to wait for a moderator. Only a quickstart conference can be setup with no PIN.
SETTINGS.US_AUTO_RECORD_HELP: If checked then conference calls will be recorded to the conference owner's mailbox
SETTINGS.US_PLAY_ENTRY_HELP: When enabled, entry tone will be played each time a participant joins this conference.
SETTINGS.US_PLAY_EXIT_HELP: When enabled, exit tone will be played each time a participant leaves this conference.
SETTINGS.US_PLAY_NAME_ENTRY_HELP: When enabled, user joining this conference will be prompted to speak their name. The name is played and heard by all the participants upon user joining the meeting.
SETTINGS.US_PLAY_NAME_EXIT_HELP: When enabled, recorded name of user leaving this meeting is played and heard by all participants.
SETTINGS.US_SELECT_MOH: Select the Music on Hold source
SETTINGS.US_MOH_CONFIG: Choose whatever the default is for the system
SETTINGS.US_SELECT_MOH_FILES: Select the Music on Hold file
SETTINGS.US_AUDIO_FILE_MOH_HELP: Choose the file from your computer to upload and add it to the Personal MoH files
SETTINGS.US_SOUND_NOTIFICATION_HELP: If unchecked, sounds will be turned off.

CHAT.DEFAULT_TEXT: Beginnen oder setzen Sie einen Chat mit einem Kontakt fort, indem Sie auf den Namen klicken.
